name: Beam (itch) (dutchlish)
description:
Welcome to Beam,

Made for the gamedev.js game jam 2021 on the theme 'Mirror'.

Instructions and controls in game (click the question mark).

5 difficulty modes, from Zen to Death. 

Credits: 

Game design and programming, Mike Bailey.

Additional level design ideas, Rhys Evans. 

Free art under creative commons license:

Power button: https://pixabay.com/vectors/power-button-switch-power-computer-32280/

Warning sign: https://pixabay.com/vectors/warning-sign-attention-caution-303768/

Tick: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Flat_tick_icon.svg

Eye: https://images.app.goo.gl/KohrhkEo1ntdD4FX7
